channel.title: Buying a server (Just basic Or advansed ITS NOT FOR ME!)read pl0x
channel.description:
Hello im the Hello my name is from alot of websites ANd
i am working at a particular website that needs a server even a basic server is fine
If possible id like a few things: the name to be Rs2fun.????.???? (? is whatever u use to make it)
THINGS THAT ARE A MUST i need to be able to control everything It has to be a pk server (even copy a tut i dont care...)
I need to be able to edit this as im adding a few things: shops people Rules and a few things besides
So if its basic its ok just needs to start out a pk server... PLEASE
i dont know how youd like to be paid: You can work at my site and be co host mod? You can be paid in rs gp? You can be paid in gratitude ? LOL
Anyway if this is against any rule (i saw no rule but if it is i apoligize) I will shut down emidetly!

i will sell you mine, i really dont play, but it owns, full working everything and that… i will say 345k? pm well i gtg SO PM ME and i will get back to you

345k
